rooms.name: Entrance Lobby

rooms.name: Master Bedroom

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Private bedroom with a study area. Vastu compliant placement ensuring positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with access to a balcony. Designed following Vastu principles for energy balance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Guest bedroom designed with wheelchair accessibility. Minimalist Art Deco design elements integrated.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Luxury home theater with immersive audio-visual experience. Accessible seating and clear pathways for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym designed with Art Deco flair and wheelchair accessible equipment and flooring.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Open plan kitchen with dining area. Vastu aligned for prosperity and energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room incorporating Art Deco style furniture and decor. Wheelchair accessible layout.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom with safety features. Vastu considerations for water placement.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Main entrance door with Art Deco detailing, ensuring wheelchair accessibility.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary door for utilities and services, designed to maintain privacy while being accessible.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access to the balcony from Bedroom 3 ensuring proper ventilation and aesthetic appeal.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: Alternate master bedroom option on first floor with en-suite bathroom. Vastu oriented for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and accessibility. Designed in Art Deco style with Vastu orientation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample storage and natural light. Incorporates Art Deco elegance.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Multi-functional bathroom for guests, ensuring Vastu balance and safety.

openings.name: Staircase

openings.name: Balcony Access
